name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Assume a martial stance based on the last weapon drawn.

Use: urekian Flourish 
Conjure dual swords from the Arsenal to rend your target, dealing 822,487 Shadow damage over 3 sec. Gain 459 Parry and 306 Avoidance until the next weapon is drawn.
 (1 Min Cooldown)

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 2,673 or your lowest secondary stat by 3,372 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.
